comment: Not quite the idea I had of Paris when I put it on my bucket list. Definitely will NOT be going there. I am sad for Paris and angered at its government that allowed this to happen to it.
amr:
# ::snt Not quite the idea I had of Paris when I put it on my bucket list. Definitely will NOT be going there. I am sad for Paris and angered at its government that allowed this to happen to it.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / idea
            :polarity -
            :topic (c / city
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Paris"))
            :ARG1-of (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :time (p / put-01
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 c
                        :ARG2 (l / list
                              :mod (b / bucket)
                              :poss ii2))
                  :degree (q / quite)))
      :snt2 (g / go-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG4 c
            :mod (d / definite))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (s / sad-02
                  :ARG1 (ii4 / i)
                  :ARG2 c)
            :op2 (a2 / anger-01
                  :ARG0 (g2 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 c)
                        :ARG0-of (a3 / allow-01
                              :ARG1 (t / this)
                              :beneficiary c))
                  :ARG1 ii4)))
